dt: {bc}a poxvirus (species {it}Vaccinia virus{/it} of the genus {it}Orthopoxvirus{/it}) that differs from but is closely related to the viruses causing smallpox and cowpox and that includes a strain used in making {a_link|vaccines} against smallpox
{bc}a reaction to smallpox {a_link|vaccine} prepared from live vaccinia virus that may involve a rash, fever, headache, and body pain

shortdef: a poxvirus (species Vaccinia virus of the genus Orthopoxvirus) that differs from but is closely related to the viruses causing smallpox and cowpox and that includes a strain used in making vaccines against smallpox
a reaction to smallpox vaccine prepared from live vaccinia virus that may involve a rash, fever, headache, and body pain
